title: Ruriiro no Yume
description:
1) A Lapis-Lazuli Blue Dream
A woman sleeps with her co-worker one night. Both are interested in more, but there's something standing in the way: the protagonist's dreams for the future.

2) Princess of the Stars
Takes a look at the realities of being in a relationship.

3) Honey & Mustard
Two women fall for the same person and decide to compete for her affections.

4) Nostalgia
About the relationship between a widow and the woman who has always loved her.

5) Season of the 20-Year-Old Virgin ~Virgin Season~
Sequel to [url=https://mangadex.org/manga/7275]20-Year-Old Girl x 30-Year-Old Maiden[/url] series. Emi and Keiko have trouble finding time to spend together.

6) On a Night When the Moon Is Full
Keiko and Emi go on a trip together.

7) Soft-Boiled Fujoshi ([url=https://mangadex.org/manga/5767]Hanjuku Joshi[/url] side story)
About Chitose's sister. Moe is more important to fujoshi than love is... or is it?

matches.title: Eclair - Anata ni Hibiku Yuri Anthology (Anthology)
Maya and Claudine (MayaKuro) Short Comics Compilation
